name: Hollowed Grounds: A Prairie Pete Tale
name_original: Hollowed Grounds: A Prairie Pete Tale
description:
A Prairie's Tale

This is the tale of Pete, a Prairie dog who is given a bedtime story from his Grandmaw, Pete.

After the story, Pete is awaken (or has he?) from his slumber and strange and eerie things happen all throughout the house. It is you, who must guide Pete and discover the secrets that lie within the house at night.

Controls

Use [W,A,S,D] to move around.

Use [Enter] or [Spacebar] to interact with the environment.
